name: 曾恕銘
objective: Introduction to state-of-the art networks and communications
schedule:
Mobile Radio Propagation
Channel Coding and Error Control (FCS in WiFi, turbo codes/ARQ+CRC in LTE/4G)
Cellular Concept
Multiple Radio Access (MAC protocols: CSMA/CA for WiFi, CSMA/CD for Ethernet)
Multiple Division Techniques (FDMA/TDMA/CDMA/OFDM)
Channel Allocations (e.g. queueing system with priority for handoff calls) 
Mobile Communication Systems
Network Protocols
Existing Wireless Systems
IEEE 802.11
Ad hoc  and sensor networks
WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN
IoT
materials: D. P. Agrawal and Q. Zeng, Introduction to Wireless and Mobile Systems, CENGAGE learning, 4/e, 2014
